content: it s time to add as much fuel as possible to the crochet revolution show your pride and solidarity by wearing your very own revolutionary armband in true diy style stitch one up however you d like not a fan of colourwork ditch it never tried it before give it a shot and don t even think of showing up to a crochet me book event without one just think of all the blog photos of armband-clad crocheters pretty revolutionary
